thread.title: Creator of Bounty Hunter War Feature Film Launches IndieGoGo Campaign
thread.title_full: Creator of Bounty Hunter War Feature Film Launches IndieGoGo Campaign

author: prbuzz.com
title: Creator of Bounty Hunter War Feature Film Launches IndieGoGo Campaign
text:
Bounty Hunter War is a full-length feature film created by Gyvon Jante, a student of the Watkins Film Institute in Nashville, Tennessee. "What began as a simple project has grown into a massive idea," says Jante, "and I am now working with a fantastic group of supporters and actors who are waiting to see this vision come to life." Jante has launched an IndieGoGo campaign to raise funds to product the full-length movie.
As seen at www.facebook.com/bountyhunterwar , Bounty Hunter War features Alberto Moscoso, Jr,; Moe Jenkins; Omeka Polk; Cali Jane; Rick Jermaine; Nora Louise; Gyvon Jante; Richie Acevedo; Therron Dumas; and Hedy Levanya. The movie concerns future cyborg bounty hunters in a technology war that features cybernetic mechanical human robots , factory slaves, garden wastelands and a CyberCity.
The plot of the movie takes place after the third world war, when the last human city in the middle of a wasteland is the setting of a war between highly advanced cyber soldiers and steam-powered soldiers of an earlier day. In between are the bounty hunters who wander through the remaining survivors and collecting those who are wanted for payment.
As seen at http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/bounty-hunter-war-feature-film , the IndieGoGo campaign has a goal of $21,000 to pay for costumes, location fees, rental of weapons, food and transportation for the actors and the crew as well as simple digital background work. Perks include many different ways of getting supporters' names and portraits into the film itself. Pledge levels range from $2 to $1,000, and perks include links, various movie posters and even production credits in the film itself. For more information, see the IndieGoGo page.
About Bounty Hunter War:
Bounty Hunter War is a full-length film in a Cyberpunk versus Steampunk format that features Cyborg bounty hunters in a technology war. The creator of the movie has now launched an IndieGoGo campaign to raise funds for production.
